name: lh-worker
description: Build lambda functions and upload them to the lambda-hub

scripts.coverage: env NODE_ENV=test env NODE_PATH=src babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --recursive test
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: env NODE_ENV=test env NODE_PATH=src mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --recursive test

author: Paolo Scanferla <paolo.scanferla@gmail.com>
